entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
